translations: adj.农村的，乡村的；有乡村特色的，有乡土气息的

phrs.translation: n. 农村信用合作社，农村信用社
田园生活；乡村生活；农村生活

sentences.sentence: It was a delightful rural scene.
sentences.translation: 那是赏心悦目的乡村风光。

sentences.sentence: He has a romantic view of rural society.
sentences.translation: 他对于乡村地区有种不切实际的看法。

sentences.sentence: Rural areas have been worst hit by the strike.
sentences.translation: 这次罢工对农村地区的打击最沉重。
